interestingFact: The U.S. has the world's longest cave system, Mammoth Cave in Kentucky.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
Brazil is home to a significant portion of the Amazon Rainforest.
The Great Barrier Reef off the coast of Australia is the world's largest coral reef system.
Japan has the highest life expectancy in the world.
India has the world's largest postal network.
Germany has over 1,500 different types of beer.
South Africa is the only country in the world to have three capital cities.
Mexico City is built on top of the ruins of an Aztec capital, Tenochtitlan.
The Great Pyramid of Giza was the tallest man-made structure for over 3,800 years.
